about_the_game:
ZAVOD is a minimalist puzzle game focused on setting up conveyor line operations.

Dozens of levels will showcase a multitude of interesting tasks by combining various mechanics. Simple controls and a minimalist style will help you enjoy the game at a leisurely pace.

Fortunately, there are no giant bugs trying to destroy your production at our factory. After all, cleanliness and order are a must at the factory.
